text: The scenario was that you were on the nearer side, and they on the farther side, and the caravan was in the valley down below you. And even if you had planned to attack the caravan, you would certainly have missed the target, so that Allah might accomplish a matter which was to be accomplished â€” that he would manifestly perish that He wished to perish, and he would manifestly keep alive that He wished to keep alive.
